content: Is there a city that is always hot?

Yes, there are several cities around the world that are known for their consistently hot climates. One such city is Dubai in the United Arab Emirates. Dubai has a desert climate with very high temperatures, especially during summer months when temperatures can soar above 45°C (113°F). Other cities with perpetually hot climates include Dallol, Ethiopia; Death Valley, California, USA; and Bandar Mahshahr, Iran.
